utterances.speaker: S1
utterances.text: Hi, I’m your nurse. What’s your pain from 0 to 10?

utterances.speaker: S1
utterances.text: Any nausea or shortness of breath?

utterances.speaker: S2
utterances.text: A little nauseous, no breathing trouble.

utterances.speaker: S2
utterances.text: Not now, I feel kinda dizzy.

utterances.speaker: S1
utterances.text: I’ll give you oxycodone 5 mg by mouth now.
